I

INSTANCE - Static variable in class dev.b3nedikt.reword.Reword
Reword is a library to update the texts of views when the apps texts have changed due to a language change or an update of the apps string resources with a lib like restring.
INSTANCE - Static variable in class dev.b3nedikt.reword.RewordInterceptor
The ViewPump Interceptor needed for class Reword

LIBRARY_PACKAGE_NAME - Static variable in class dev.b3nedikt.reword.BuildConfig
 

R

Reword - Class in dev.b3nedikt.app_locale
Reword is a library to update the texts of views when the apps texts have changed due to a language change or an update of the apps string resources with a lib like restring.
reword(parent) - Static method in class dev.b3nedikt.reword.Reword
Will update the text of all views in the view hierarchy below the provided parent view. Can be used to update the texts of a activity or fragment without restarting it. To do this just use the root view of the activity or fragment.
RewordInterceptor - Class in dev.b3nedikt.app_locale
The ViewPump Interceptor needed for class Reword
RewordInterceptorKt - Class in dev.b3nedikt.app_locale
